candidates.title: chore: update a number of dependencies
Adding execute_transaction_and_wait_for_checkpoint client helper method
candidates.body: Adding helper method that executes a txn and waits for it to be included in a checkpoint (which ensures that indexes have been updated and we can read our writes).

candidates.title: sui-rpc: add accessors and builder methods for protobuf messages
candidates.body: Add initial support for generated accessors and builder methods for protobuf messages. This is presently limited to only supporting types in the same package.

candidates.title: add non_exhaustive to many public types and add const constructors for Address, Digest, Identifier
sui-crypto: introduce bls12381 support
candidates.body: Introduce bls12381 support, adding the ability to sign, aggregate and verify validator signatures over CheckpointSummary messages.

candidates.title: ci: check for dirty repository after tests
ci: use latest rust version for wasm
Faucet v2
candidates.body: This PR updates the codebase to use the new v2 faucet APIs.

candidates.title: sui-sdk-types: some refactors and doc additions
candidates.body:
This PR includes a number of commits that:
- Add docs to the top level of the crate
- Adds docs to Address and a few related helper functions
- configures rustfmt to format doc examples
- renames the various `to_address` functions to `derive_address`

and it adds a bcs gaurentee and Closes #71


This is the beginning of an effort to better document the library, many more doc PRs are to come...

candidates.title: GQL updates for replay v2
candidates.body:
This PR does a few things but mainly
- it exposes the Epoch type from GraphQL
- adds the relevant epoch(s) queries to fetch the epoch data
- opens up a few functions on Page and Error. This is useful when building custom queries and reusing Client implementations, rather than hacking new ones because of the private functions. See more here: https://github.com/MystenLabs/sui/compare/main...stefan/replay#diff-52600bf8b445d87608fdcdf45a285335da6140939f250524fd2fea514444a38eR63-R129

candidates.title: chore: update proptest to 1.6.0
candidates.body: Update proptest to 1.6.0 which addresses the various bugs that were causing us to pin to a patched version.

candidates.title: remove support for generating a json schema with schemars
candidates.body: The new direction with RPC is to leverage protobuf and gRPC instead of a hand-rolled REST interface with custom defined JSON payloads. Due to that we no longer need to support a welldefined json schema from the types exposed by this sdk.

candidates.title: sui-crypto: add support for verifying passkey authenticators
[GraphQL Client] Force reqwest to use rustls-tls to avoid using openssl
candidates.body: Force reqwest to use rustls-tls to avoid using openssl via native-tls crate.

candidates.title: types: enable proptest::Arbitrary impls via the 'proptest' feature
[GraphQL Client] Add a build crate to allow registering the schema in other crates
candidates.body:
Found out that registering a schema is required as `cynic` does not export it in a way that it can be trivially added to external crates that need to use `sui-graphql-client`.

This PR adds a new crate `sui-graphql-client-build` which will keep the schema file and that has a function that can be called by any crate to register the schema needed to build custom queries on top of using `sui-graphql-client`. To avoid confusion, we also use it in the `sui-graphql-client`.
